text: Materials. Synovial tissue was obtained from a patient at the Department of Orthopedics and Pathology, Shanghai Third People's Hospital (Shanghai, China). SH was purchased from Unattached cells were then transferred into centrifuge tubes and centrifuged for 10 min. A total of 4 ml 0.25% trypsin was added and the cells were incubated for 30 min. The solution was then filtered using a 200-mesh nylon net. Following centrifugation for 10 min, the cells were incubated as aforementioned for 24 h. The unattached cells were discarded, leaving primary cells from a patient with RA (Fig. 1) .
